cards.title: Jarton Lore
cards.description: Enjoy a custom currated story with amazing quests, dungeons, jobs, custom items & boss fights!

cards.title: Bedrock Supported
cards.description: Join from any platform using our Bedrock-compatible system. Sweet and smooth. No more leaving behind your bedrock friends!

cards.title: Community Orriented
cards.description: Minecraft is more fun with friends. We've built this server with that in mind. Enjoy a community driven community!
